page.title: 17Modern Poultry Farming.
page.content: { Mr.Hemmings}of Pear Tree and Silver- dale Farms keeps two breeds of chick- ens.One of them is{Cobb}and the other is{Ross.}He keeps them to lay live eggs which go to be hatched at Church Stretton and then fattened for meat. He keeps them in{7 sheds,}each one contains about{2,857 chickens.}It is easy to feed them all.They are fed by a machine that takes the feed out of a tank onto a conveyor belt and around the sheds.They eat fish meal,crushed wheat,protein feed and grit,which is to make the egg shells.They drink from a cup shaped thing which hangs from the the roof.A pipe leads from it to a tank of water. The hens are kept for{60 weeks}then they are sold for meat paste and pies. Day old chicks take their place.Feath- ers go for pillows,oil for cosmetics and muck goes onto the fields.
